creator: andreas.schwaff@gmx.net
text:
I'm using a set of fonts for creating an PDF-Dokument. Unfortunatley I get an
Error 135 when viewing the created document with Adobe Acrobat Reader. With
other PDF-Viewer the document ist displayed without problems. 
When creating the same document with the same fonts with the new FOP-version
(0.94) everything (including the embedded fonts) is also displayed correctly,
even with Adobe. I created the font-metrics-xml with the enclosed TTFReader.

Just checked myself: Font is working fine in 0.94 or later. Bug is for an old
release we most likely won't do a bugfix release for. So why bother filing a bug
report?
creator: jeremias@apache.org
gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition to closed remaining pre-FOP1.0 resolved bugs
